title: Cycle Time Measurement
description: This FUNCTION_BLOCK is responsible for tracking cycle times in a process. It initializes cycle time values, updates minimum and maximum cycle times based on elapsed cycles, and counts the number of cycles that have occurred. The block resets the cycle time when requested.
name: CYCLE_TIME

input.name: RST
input.description: A boolean flag to reset the cycle time measurements.

output.name: sysdays
output.description: The number of days accounted for in system time.

output.name: cycles
output.description: The total count of cycles that have occurred.
